Package controllers

Class Account

  • java.lang.Object
    • play.mvc.Controller
      • controllers.Account
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    play.classloading.enhancers.ControllersEnhancer.ControllerSupport, play.classloading.enhancers.LocalvariablesNamesEnhancer.LocalVariablesSupport, play.mvc.PlayController
    public class Account
extends play.mvc.Controller
    This class creates and manages the User accounts for the program. This class contains 6 static methods that can be accessed by other parts of this program to manage user accounts as necessary.
    Author:
    Dermot O'Riordan

    • Nested Class Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method Description
      static void authenticate​(java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      If the user input the correct email address and password when attempting to log in, then the user will be redirected to their Stations dashboard, otherwise they will be returned to the home page to re-attempt logging in.
      static User getLoggedInUser()
      A method to retrieve the currently logged-in user and return this user as a User.
      static void login()
      Renders the Login page for users to sign in.
      static void logout()
      Redirects the user to the home page when they log out.
      static void register​(java.lang.String firstname, java.lang.String lastname, java.lang.String email, java.lang.String password)
      Creates a new user upon registration, accepting the user's personal details from the values they input into the registration form.
      static void signup()
      Renders the registration page for new users to sign up.

    • Method Detail

      • signup

        public static void signup()
        Renders the registration page for new users to sign up.

      • login

        public static void login()
        Renders the Login page for users to sign in.

      • register

        public static void register​(java.lang.String firstname,
                            java.lang.String lastname,
                            java.lang.String email,
                            java.lang.String password)
        Creates a new user upon registration, accepting the user's personal details from the values they input into the registration form.
        Parameters:
        firstname - The user's Christian name.
        lastname - The user's surname.
        email - The user's email address.
        password - The user's password.

      • authenticate

        public static void authenticate​(java.lang.String email,
                                java.lang.String password)
        If the user input the correct email address and password when attempting to log in, then the user will be redirected to their Stations dashboard, otherwise they will be returned to the home page to re-attempt logging in.
        Parameters:
        email - The user's email address.
        password - The user's password.

      • logout

        public static void logout()
        Redirects the user to the home page when they log out.

      • getLoggedInUser

        public static User getLoggedInUser()
        A method to retrieve the currently logged-in user and return this user as a User. Returns to the login page if it cannot recognise the user as logged in.
        Returns:
        The user that is logged in.
